mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM edu_course_collect WHERE gmt_create > CURDATE() and member_id = #{memberid} and is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY gmt_create ORDER BY gmt_create DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM edu_course_collect WHERE gmt_create BETWEEN DATE ( subdate( curdate()- 1, date_format( curdate()- 1, '%w' )- 1 )) AND DATE ( subdate( curdate()- 1, date_format( curdate()- 1, '%w' )- 7 )) AND member_id = #{memberid} AND is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY gmt_create ORDER BY gmt_create DESC
SELECT c.price as price , COUNT(*) AS total FROM edu_course_collect cc LEFT JOIN edu_course c ON c.id = cc.course_id where member_id = #{memberid} AND cc.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY c.price

SELECT cc.id AS collectId, c.id AS courseId, t.`name` AS teacherName, c.title AS courseTitle, c.price AS coursePrice, c.description AS courseDescription, cc.gmt_create AS collectGmtCreate, s.title AS subjectTitle FROM edu_course_collect cc LEFT JOIN edu_course c ON cc.course_id = c.id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher t ON t.id = c.teacher_id LEFT JOIN edu_subject s ON s.id = c.subject_parent_id WHERE cc.member_id = #{memberid} AND cc.is_deleted = 0
